bestScenarioResults.description: The best configuration based on profit is characterized by 11 zones with 48 total poles.
The best configuration based on satisfied demand is characterized by 11 zones with 48 total poles.

bestScenarioResults.description: Optimal fleet size ensures minimal idle time and high vehicle utilization with 250 vehicles across 15 routes.
Maximizing revenue involves 280 vehicles operating across 20 zones with high-frequency trips.

bestScenarioResults.description: The ideal parking configuration minimizes congestion and maximizes revenue with 120 spots in 10 strategic locations.
